
---
title: 'Redmi K50 系列首销战报公布：5 分钟销量突破 33 万台'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 热榜
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/3/3961fa0e-b965-4cd8-8a89-cb99953a6a87.jpg@s_2,w_820,h_1093'

comments: false
date: Tue, 22 Mar 2022 03:46:36 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/3/3961fa0e-b965-4cd8-8a89-cb99953a6a87.jpg@s_2,w_820,h_1093'
---

<div>   
<div class="tougao-user">感谢IT之家网友 <a href="https://m.ithome.com/html/app/open.html?url=ithome%3A%2F%2Fuserpage%3Fid%3D1457190" rel="nofollow">BB狼</a>、<a href="https://m.ithome.com/html/app/open.html?url=ithome%3A%2F%2Fuserpage%3Fid%3D1302930" rel="nofollow">Heisen_berg</a>、<a href="https://m.ithome.com/html/app/open.html?url=ithome%3A%2F%2Fuserpage%3Fid%3D1796060" rel="nofollow">七七才</a>、<a href="https://m.ithome.com/html/app/open.html?url=ithome%3A%2F%2Fuserpage%3Fid%3D1044078" rel="nofollow">软媒用户1044078</a> 的线索投递！</div>
            <p data-vmark="c651"><a class="s_tag" href="https://www.ithome.com/" target="_blank">IT之家</a> 3 月 22 日消息，Redmi K50 系列今日首销，官方也公布了新机的首销战报：5 分钟销量突破 33 万台。按照 Redmi K50 标准版最低 2399 元的价格计算，<span class="accentTextColor">5 分钟 Redmi 至少收入约 7.9 亿元</span>。</p><p data-vmark="4233" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/3/3961fa0e-b965-4cd8-8a89-cb99953a6a87.jpg@s_2,w_820,h_1093" w="1080" h="1440" title="Redmi K50 系列首销战报公布：5 分钟销量突破 33 万台" srcset="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/3/3961fa0e-b965-4cd8-8a89-cb99953a6a87.jpg 2x" width="1080" height="1093" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="3ba4">IT之家了解到，Redmi K50 全球首发联发科天玑 8100 处理器，拥有 LPDDR5+UFS 3.1，配备 3950mm<sup>2 </sup>液冷立体散热系统。屏幕方面搭载 6.67 英寸 3200x1440 三星 AMOLED 柔性直屏幕，E4 发光材质，120Hz 刷新率，支持 1.6 万级自动亮度、环境色温感应、全程 DC 调光，康宁大猩猩 Victus 保护玻璃。</p><p data-vmark="ddbc">Redmi K50 Pro 搭载联发科天玑 9000 处理器，LPDDR5+UFS 3.1，3950mm<sup>2</sup> 液冷立体散热系统。屏幕为 6.67 英寸 3200x1440 三星 AMOLED 柔性直屏幕，E4 发光材质，120Hz 刷新率，通过 DisplayMate A + 认证。</p><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&"
